summary: An Ayleid font based on glyphs found in Elder Scrolls Online.
descriptionHtml:
[img]https://i.imgur.com/9UDDDPH.jpg[/img]

This is an Ayleid font based on glyphs found in Elder Scrolls Online and Elder Scrolls IV: Oblivion. It includes both upper and lower case letters, as well as most punctuation marks.  

This font is free for personal, noncommercial use. You may also use it for your commercial projects as long as they are related to the Elder Scrolls. 

For example, you may use it in:[list]
[*]Commissioned artwork
[*]Branding for your Patreon page
[*]Your Creation Club mod 
[*]Etc.
[/list]
But you may not use it in:
[list]
[*]Your new indie game
[*]In your Dungeons and Dragons Kickstarter 
[*]Etc.
[/list]

Please do not redistribute this font without attaching this readme.

Credit is always appreciated but not required.

Questions? Get in touch with me [url=http://ladynerevar.tumblr.com]Tumblr[/url]  or via the Nexus Mods messaging system. Got a lot of use out of this font? You can make a donation on [url=http://Ko-fi.com/ladynerevar]Ko-Fi[/url].
author: Lady Nerevar
